TRANSACTION.TITLE: 7607 本日轧账(现金)
TRANSACTION.VARIABLE:
<ITEM LINE="3"  COL="3" TYPE="%-60s" FUNCTIONS=
    "T(7608                         本日轧账<现金>)"/>
  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

 
  "{
 	//2009/1/13 22:21:00 新增martin  不知道余额不准轧帐
 	 dim @tota as string;
   commsend_001();
  $FD16='8401';
  $FD21='01';
	$FD64=#TLRNO;
	$FD91=$FD3;
	$FD40=getitems('#TOTAMT');
	@tota=callserver();
	if($FD12!='0000')
	{
		showmsg(geterror());
		return(false);
	}
	if($FD70!='1')
	{
		showmsg('余额输入不正确!请柜员清点钱箱');
		return(false);
	}
	//end新增martin  不知道余额不准轧帐
	}"
  

  
  
  

  


  "{
        dim @tota as string;
        dim @f as file;
        dim @filename as string;
        @tota='';
        @filename='本日轧账[现金]['+$TLRNO+']';
        commsend_001();
	$FD91=#TLRNO;
	$TXNO='5608';
	@tota=callserver();
	if($FD12!='0000')
	{
		showmsg(geterror());
		return(false);
	}
	@f=openfile('../tmp/本日轧账[现金]['+$TLRNO+']','w');
	writeline(@f,@tota);
	closefile(@f);
	call('fview ../tmp/本日轧账[现金]['+$TLRNO+']');

  }"
